title: MT5: Password Reset (request)
description: To reset the password of MT5 account.

new_password.description: New password of the account. For validation (Accepts any printable ASCII character. Must be within 8-25 characters, and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters. Must not be the same as the user's email address).

password_type.description: [Optional] Type of the password to reset.

verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a `verify_email` call, which must be done first)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
